title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: When analyzing the bug report, I observed that the report design is currently storing the absolute path for library includes. However, it should store the relative path instead.
OB: The report design is storing the absolute path for the library include: <property name="fileName"/>E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: The report design should store the relative path for the library include.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a report design.
2. Include a library using an absolute path.
3. Save the report design.
4. Check the property value for the library include and observe that it stores the absolute path instead of the relative path.
